casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Vaughn E. RUSSELL, BY AND THROUGH its administrator, Nancy E. RUSSELL, and Nancy E. Russell, individually
v.
Sondra Lynn RUSSELL and Janice M. Russell No. 268P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Steven D. Starnes, Attorney at Law, Monroe, for Russell, Vaughn E. (Estate of), et al. Sanjay R. Gohil, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Russell, Sondra Lynn, et al. Andrea Solorzano, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of August 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
